query:
UPDATE email_trigger
                SET
                    script_path = $1,
                    path = $2,
                    is_flow = $3,
                    edited_by = $4,
                    email = $5,
                    edited_at = now(),
                    error_handler_path = $6,
                    error_handler_args = $7,
                    retry = $8,
                    mode = $9
                WHERE
                    workspace_id = $10 AND path = $11
